#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
typedef long long ll;
int main()
{
	char at[105];
	char ar[8];
	ll t,i,n;
	ll ap[200];
	ll res;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		res=0;
	memset(ap,0,sizeof(ap));
	scanf("%s%s",ar,at);
	n=strlen(at);
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	ap[at[i]-'a']++;
	for(i=0;i<26;i++)
	res=res^ap[i];
	if((res!=0 && ar[0]=='V')||(res==0 && ar[0]=='T'))
	printf("Varun\n");
	if((res!=0 && ar[0]=='T')||(res==0 && ar[0]=='V'))
	printf("Tarun\n");
}
	
return 0;
}
